model.storage

Interface IDAOFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SerializationDAOFactory, SQLDAOFactory

    public interface IDAOFactory
    Author:
    murphyra An abstract factory for creating data access objects.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Result endTransaction(boolean commit)
      Ends the transaction with the DB (if appropriate).
      java.sql.Connection getConnection()
      Returns a connection to the DB.
      IStorageDAO getItemDAO() 
      IStorageDAO getMiscStorageDAO()

      Initialize the connection to the DB.

      Starts a transaction with the DB (if appropriate).

    • Method Detail

      • getItemDAO

        IStorageDAO getItemDAO()
        Returns:
        an item data access object. The implementation of the DAO is defined by the implementation of this interface.

      • getProductDAO

        IStorageDAO getProductDAO()
        Returns:
        a product data access object. The implementation of the DAO is defined by the implementation of this interface.

      • getProductGroupDAO

        IStorageDAO getProductGroupDAO()
        Returns:
        a product group data access object. The implementation of the DAO is defined by the implementation of this interface.

      • getStorageUnitDAO

        IStorageDAO getStorageUnitDAO()
        Returns:
        a storage unit data access object. The implementation of the DAO is defined by the implementation of this interface.

      • getMiscStorageDAO

        IStorageDAO getMiscStorageDAO()

      • startTransaction

        Result startTransaction()
        Starts a transaction with the DB (if appropriate). If the program is not running in SQL mode, no action is taken.
        Returns:
        False if there was some DB error, else true.

      • endTransaction

        Result endTransaction(boolean commit)
        Ends the transaction with the DB (if appropriate). If the program is not running in SQL mode, no action is taken.
        Parameters:
        commit - Whether the transaction should be committed, or rolled back.
        Returns:
        False if there was some DB error, else true.

      • getConnection

        java.sql.Connection getConnection()
        Returns a connection to the DB. If the program is running in SQL mode, NULL is returned.
        Returns:
        a pointer to a Connection, or NULL.

      • initializeConnection

        Result initializeConnection()
        Initialize the connection to the DB.
        Returns:
        A Result indicating the success of the initialization.
